dialog: [through mock tears] I hate goodbyes, don't you? I just go to pieces.
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Why, I'm a student of friendship, of course. Unless you don't think you're good enough to teach me.
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Fine! From now on, I won't try to help. At! All!
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Oh! Some thanks for all my help. And after I hired all those substitute teachers for you.
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Uh... [stuttering] I don't know what you're getting at.
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Oh, I better take this. Hello?
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Oh, he did not! And what did you say?
title: A Matter of Principals

dialog: Or we could go cause a little mischief. I know a trick that'll turn Celestia's castle into cheese. Do you think it's a "gouda" idea? [laughs] That's just the first of many cheese jokes if we go down this path.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: You already planned the perfect moment during the party to make the grand announcement to everypony about your plan. Brava, Twilight! I can't wait to tell your plan to Fluttershy and the others!
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: No, no. Clearly, Starlight is beyond basic friendship lessons. She just won a medal, for Equestria's sake. I thought you were joking. You are joking, right?
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: You weren't coming up with a plan just now, were you? Oh, dear. This could be pretty embarrassing for you.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Psst! I see what you're doing.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Probably because you're not as close as you think you are. [laughs] Just kidding. She wanted it to be a big surprise. Just between us, she's getting ready to make a big announcement!
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Darn it. I was hoping you would send her to my realm. We could've been roomies. Way to not pick up what I was putting down.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Yes, Starlight is student of the year, isn't she? She has so much potential. So, what are we going to do with her? And by "we", I definitely mean "you". Being her mentor and all that, her destiny falls squarely on your haunches.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: And that's why you're the party expert. Thank you, Pinkie Pie. I feel so much better now.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Make Fluttershy feel comfortable, make Fluttershy feel comfortable, comfortable, comfortable... Well, I mean, that shouldn't be a problem.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Yes, you can. Your finest tea set, please. I want only the best for my friend Fluttershy.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Oh, dear. That might be a problem.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Okay. Since Fluttershy always goes out of her way to host the perfect tea party for me, how do I make my tea party for her even more perfect?
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Got it! We know Fluttershy, and we know what she likes. First of all, we need to get rid of all the new stuff.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Yes... judgy... clerk... pony! Why is it such a surprise? Sure, she's on the quieter side, and I'm a bit, well, more showy. But I'll have you know we're besties. And that's why I need the [echoing] best tea set!
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: And I'm almost certain she likes stairs...
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Oh, wonderful! I'll be enjoying her company tomorrow, so I will be needing your very best tea, please. Something especially special.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Oh, dear Fluttershy, worry not. I can assure you that for the first time, I'm feeling perfectly normal. Now, let me top you off.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: It really is nice having you here.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Enjoy your all-expense-paid trip around Equestria!
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: [to himself] Oh, here we go...
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: [gravelly accent] June, honey, be a dear. Reschedule Luna and Cay-Cay. [normal, aside] That's what I call Princess Celestia, what a hoot! [gravelly accent] In fact, clear the whole evening. Tonight is guys' night. These fellas invited me to spice things up and bring a little class to the whole affair.
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: Couldn't I just come with you instead?
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: Don't you laugh at me, Big Mac! Does it really say that? Let me see.
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: This can't be. I'm supposed to feel sorry for you because I'm me and you're you.
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: Oh, Twilight's friend and Applejack's monosyllabic brother, if only I weren't super busy this evening.
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: Oh, yes. Thank you, Fluttershy, for your concern. If only your pony friends could be as considerate...
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: Oh. Well, it does, very much so. You're so very kind, my dear Fluttershy. I always knew that you were the understanding one, not like those nasty friends of yours.
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: Oh... [sniggers] He's adorable the way he is.
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: Oh, our pony guests! [upper class voice] We're so delighted that you've come. Please, do come in.
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: Buh-bye, have a nice time! Everything is fine here. Bye bye... Bye bye...
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: Where are you going? What's wrong, pal?
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: I like it better my way, but... I guess when you're friends, you can't always have things exactly your way all the time, eh?
title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

dialog: "Oh, Tree Hugger. You're such a great friend. So much funnier than unfunny old Discord!"
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: Yes, yes, yes, of course. Tell me, have you seen Fluttershy anywhere?
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: "No, no, here. Take my plus-one. I insist. Before somepony else thinks he's my friend and expects to be asked instead. What's that? You're worried Discord might be upset?" Not a problem! I can make more new friends anytime I want. It's not as if any of this actually mattered! I don't even want to go to the Gala anyway!
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: Good evening, everypony! What a glorious affair!
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: You? [laughs] Of course not! You think I don't have other friends? I'm centuries old! I was talking about the Smooze! Smooze Face, the Smoozinator <U+0096> well, I mean that's what we called him back in college. Smooze! I would like you to meet Fluttershy and, um, hmm... Tree... how'd you say it... Tree Embrace?
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: Oh, oh! It looks like somepony wants to mingle. We'll be back in a bit.
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: As well as we could, considering you've already stomped all over our friendship by inviting her to the biggest night of the year as if I didn't matter at all!
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: I don't suppose that, uh, these adorable little cutie pies have their own tickets to the Gross Gruesome Gala, do they?
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: Why don't you ask your zebra friend if she knows anything?
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1

dialog: Well then, it seems we've reached an impasse. I'm telling the truth, but you think I'm lying. What do friends like us do in a situation like this, Princess Twilight? Congrats, by the way, on the promotion. You totally deserve it.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1

dialog: And rob you of a valuable lesson about being princess? What kind of friend do you think I am?
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: Oh, I do hope she breaks into a song this time!
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: [laughing] You should see yourselves right now. The expressions on your face. So intense. So sure of yourselves. [laughing] Hilarious!
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: Of course. "Love is... something-something, and Discord is great." I don't know. Can we play O&O now?
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: Well, not yet, technically. In fact, she can't break your heart if you break hers first.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: Oh, I hate seeing you like this, Big Mac. And over a girl, no less. I'm calling an emergency Guys' Night [poof!] right now to cheer you up.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: I'm a realist. And love, like all things warm and fuzzy, isn't real.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: "Spike <U+0096> Love is about spying in the bushes."
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: Lesson one <U+0096> nothing can break your heart if you only love yourself. You've got to show everypony that you're too cool to be bothered with so-called love. Observe.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: [chuckling] Did you miss me, Celestia? I missed you. It's quite lonely being encased in stone, but you wouldn't know that, would you, because I don't turn ponies into stone.
title: The Return of Harmony Part 1

dialog: Oh, for goodness sake! You've been kind for far too long, my dear. Time to be cruel. Arrivederci!
title: The Return of Harmony Part 1

dialog: I'll be grateful for your charity Until the bitter end Because I've heard that tenderness Is what you lend an ailing friend
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: But how was I supposed to know for sure that I'm truly still friends with one of the most important ponies around?
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Well, I was in my thinking tree <U+0096> that's where I do most of my really deep thinking <U+0096> I was there, and I said to myself, I said, "Discord, your friend Twilight says that she's your pal, but she never writes and she never pops in for a visit."
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Did I hear you two talking about Princess Cadance's visit with Princess Twilight?
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Disturb them? I wouldn't dream of it. Not when I have two such dear friends of my own who have already offered to take care of me. And at such peril! This flu of mine is highly- [snorts] [sneezes] contagious.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Oh, how elated I am to hear that. Shall the three of us head back to your place? I don't want to get anypony else sick.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: I so hope you don't mind, Pinkie Pie.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Just knowing that I have a good friend like you to take care of me has made me feel better already. I'll be fine here on my own. Oh, just before you go, just a little small request.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: But taking in the sick and the desperate - isn't that what Fluttershy would do? Isn't 'helping' something that friends do for friends? Unless, of course, you're really saying that you're not my friend.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Well, then lucky for you. We're here.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Well, of course we do! We're friends! It's just such a shame that today of all days is when I really need her. Oh, well, I know what to do.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: By seeing if you would go to the ends of Equestria for me, of course. Which you did, literally. Congratulations, Twilight, you passed my friendship test!
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: And if they're not, this rare opportunity to focus on their friendship will certainly bring them closer. Unless...
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: I'm so glad that you're back from your trip, Fluttershy. Just your presence here is making me feel so much better. I was just wondering, could I trouble you for just one more thing?
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: [hushed] They took Fluttershy?
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1

dialog: It is certainly a pleasure to have such dedicated fans. I'll have to come back with some new material after I rescue Fluttershy.
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: [hushed] They took Fluttershy?
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: Yes, but when the throne is destroyed, I'll be able to rip the very fabric of reality to save our friends, while you'll still be a self-absorbed, below-average illusionist!
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: That's all very nice, but really a waste of time. We have me. And what else could we possibly need?
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: But you are obviously not Fluttershy!
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: Splendid idea! Now who's ready for some celebratory tea at Fluttershy's?!
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: [mock sadness] Oh, my. Is eavesdropping not the way you're supposed to find out what your best pals are up to? Woe is me. Will I ever learn the intricate nuances of being a good friend?
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

dialog: Shining Armor, why, whatever are you doing here?
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

dialog: Oh, we were. But Tirek offered me so much more than just tea parties. Surely you saw this coming.
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

dialog: Twilight! This makes twice I'm seeing you in one day! Aren't I lucky?
title: What About Discord?

dialog: [laughing] Catch you later, Twilight.
title: What About Discord?

dialog: Well, let me try and paint her a picture, dearest.
title: What About Discord?

dialog: And what about you, dear? Fluttershy, is it?
title: A Bird in the Hoof

dialog: I'll say a few words, and then we'll begin with the vows. Shining Armor, you'll get the ring from your best mare.
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1

dialog: You have a lot to think about.
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1

dialog: Hm. The union of Princess Cadance and Shining Armor. The strength of their commitment is clear. The power of their love, undeniable. May we have the rings please? I now pronounce you mare and colt!
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

dialog: Don't worry about me. I'm fine. You have a real wedding to put together.
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

dialog: Mares and gentlecolts, we are gathered here today to witness the union of [muffled] Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and Shining Armor.
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

dialog: Mares and gentlecolts, we are gathered here today to celebrate the union of the real Princess Mi Amore Cadenza<U+0096>
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

dialog: Princess Cadance and Shining Armor, it is my great pleasure to pronounce you<U+0096>
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

dialog: This is your victory as much as theirs. You persisted in the face of doubt, and your actions led to your being able to bring the real Princess Cadance back to us. Learning to trust your instincts is a valuable lesson to learn.
title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

dialog: [sighs] Perhaps. But she is like this every morning.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: [sighs] But it means a lot that you tried. I love you, sister.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: Well, there's nothing wrong here. Right, sister?
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: [laughs] Oh, you really are a card!
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: That's not true! Even when we were apart, I knew I needed her!
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: So the map sent you to solve a friendship problem?
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: Really? Oh, that is wonderful, Starlight! What is it?
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: I believe that one means your mission is complete.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: [laughing] It's all real. It was the right call going with your gut.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: But my magic isn't powerful enough! I thought if we worked together...!
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: ...can actually be the thing that helps you make your closest friends and realize how special you are. Hmm...
title: Call of the Cutie

dialog: I think Starlight Glimmer might feel the same way about you. If that is what you're afraid of.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: So you have an overachieving student. Sounds familiar.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Here we are after all these years, Twilight. We are living proof that letting someone spread their wings doesn't mean you no longer have a place in their lives.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: What if she runs into a manticore? Or what if she gets pulled into Tartarus? Or, worst of all, what if she doesn't get along with anypony?!
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: It's a wonderful feeling, isn't it? Watching your student shine the way you always knew they could.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Maybe I could close the library or throw a party in the castle. Oh, she'd have to talk to the other fillies then! Oh. I must send her away.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: And that's why we're proud and honored to give them the Equestrian Pink Hearts of Courage!
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: I loved having you as a student. You challenged me and taught me just as much as I taught you. I am embarrassed to admit it, but I was afraid if you made friends, you wouldn't need me anymore.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: And if you're still worried, you can always make her write you letters.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: [voiceover] She was truly one of my best students.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: [voiceover] I knew there was a special group of fillies in Ponyville, but I kept inventing all kinds of reasons why I shouldn't send you.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Eventually, I realized all the anxiety I felt was because I didn't want you to go.
title: Celestial Advice

dialog: Exactly, Twilight. Now, unfortunately, because the two of you were busy tricking each other instead of shaking down leaves, many of the lovely trees of Equestria are still covered.
title: Fall Weather Friends

dialog: Sounds to me that an important lesson was learned.
title: Fall Weather Friends

dialog: Twilight Sparkle, my faithful student. I knew you could do it.
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: I told you that you needed to make some friends, nothing more. I saw the signs of Nightmare Moon's return, and I knew it was you who had the magic inside to defeat her, but you could not unleash it until you let true friendship into your heart. Now if only another will as well. Princess Luna!
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: Spike, take a note, please. I, Princess Celestia, hereby decree that the unicorn Twilight Sparkle shall take on a new mission for Equestria. She must continue to study the magic of friendship. She must report to me her findings from her new home in Ponyville.
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: It has been a thousand years since I have seen you like this. Time to put our differences behind us. We were meant to rule together, little sister.
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: Why so glum, my faithful student? Are you not happy that your quest is complete and you can return to your studies in Canterlot?
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: Will you accept my friendship?
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: Thank you so much, Twilight! This is what I always knew theater must be about <U+0096> that special stage pony bond of shared trust and honesty.
title: Horse Play

dialog: You're not the only ones. What did you have in mind?
title: Horse Play

dialog: I'm upset because, in all the time we've known each other, I thought I taught you about the importance of friendship, trust, and honesty!
title: Horse Play

dialog: [with wildly varying tone] Come on, Star Swirl. Throw off that must-Y hat and let's have a... a dance!
title: Horse Play

dialog: Oh, uh, forgive me for getting so excited. It's just, when I was a filly, my friends often put on plays. [sighs] It was so wonderful. Everypony coming together to create a magical experience to share with others. I've always believed theater brings out the best in us and forges a special bond of friendship.
title: Horse Play

dialog: Should I get you a blanket?
title: Horse Play

dialog: My love for Equestria and all the ponies in it! Twilight, you felt what I was emoting, didn't you?
title: Horse Play

dialog: I'm not upset because you insulted my acting.
title: Horse Play

dialog: You shouldn't. I never felt I had to be on stage to be a part of the show. All I ever wanted was to share an honest bond of creativity, artistry, and happiness with my friends. And that's exactly what I got to do.
title: Horse Play

dialog: Then I would be delighted to join your theater troupe!
title: Horse Play

dialog: [sighs] You had good intentions, Twilight. But you know that the truth is always better than a well-meant lie. Didn't Applejack remind you?
title: Horse Play

dialog: Good morning, Twilight. Love the new hairstyle. Well, happy Tuesday!
title: It's About Time

dialog: Your friend Spike made me aware that you were letting your fears get the best of you. I commend him for taking your feelings seriously. Now, if you will all excuse me, I must return to Canterlot. I'm expecting some mail.
title: Lesson Zero

dialog: You are a wonderful student, Twilight. I don't have to get a letter every week to know that.
title: Lesson Zero

dialog: From this day forth, I would like you all to report to me your findings on the magic of friendship when, and only when, you happen to discover them.
title: Lesson Zero

dialog: Looks like you all learned a pretty valuable lesson today.
title: Lesson Zero

dialog: You did something today that's never been done before. Something even a great unicorn like Star Swirl the Bearded was not able to do, because he did not understand friendship like you do. The lessons you've learned here in Ponyville have taught you well. You have proven that you're ready, Twilight.
title: Magical Mystery Cure

dialog: You've come such a long, long way And I've watched you from that very first day To see how you might grow To see what you might do To see what you've been through And all the ways you've made me proud of you
title: Magical Mystery Cure

dialog: We are gathered here today in celebration of a momentous occasion. My most faithful student, Twilight Sparkle, has done many extraordinary things since she's lived in Ponyville. She even helped reunite me with my sister, Princess Luna. But today, Twilight Sparkle did something extraordinary. She created new magic, proving without a doubt that she is ready to be crowned Equestria's newest princess. Fillies and gentlecolts, may I present for the very first time, Princess Twilight Sparkle!
title: Magical Mystery Cure

dialog: Not in the same way as before. I'll still be here to help and guide you, but we're all your students now, too. You are an inspiration to us all, Twilight.
title: Magical Mystery Cure

dialog: I know! Can you imagine how dull it would have been if I hadn't invited Discord? Come on! Whoo! The night is still young!
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: And you did a wonderful job of it. You and your friends.
title: Party Pooped

dialog: You may no longer be my student, Princess Twilight, but I hope you know that I will always be here if you need me. Just as I hope that you will always be there when I need you.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1

dialog: But now it has become a wonderful reminder of her transformation back into Princess Luna, and our happy reunion. I am so pleased that you will be playing a role in the festivities. I know it must have been difficult to see your friends return to Ponyville without you.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1

dialog: For my subjects, it has always been a celebration of my defeat of Nightmare Moon. But for me... [sighs] It was just a terrible reminder that I'd had to banish my own sister.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1

dialog: A letter from Ponyville, I presume?
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1

dialog: Oh, dear sister. I am sorry, but you have given me no choice but to use these.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: Luna, I will not fight you! You must lower the moon! It is your duty!
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: I do not know where they are. But I do know that it is a mystery you will not be solving alone.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: Citizens of Equestria, it is no longer with a heavy heart but with great joy that I raise the summer sun. For this celebration now represents not the defeat of Nightmare Moon, but the return of my sister, Princess Luna.
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: [giggles] Oh, Twilight. You were my star pupil. If anyone knows how to run a school, it's you.
title: School Daze - Part 1

dialog: I think a school of friendship is a wonderful idea, Twilight! I'll help in any way I can.
title: School Daze - Part 1

dialog: Twilight! I was so relieved to get your letter!
title: School Daze - Part 2

dialog: You might find you need help.
title: Shadow Play - Part 1

dialog: [hushed] Well, we can't just come to this wedding empty-hoofed!
title: Slice of Life

dialog: [hushed] What do you mean you left it on the counter?!
title: Slice of Life

dialog: [hushed] Next time, you can just bring your own gift, and I'll bring mine.
title: Slice of Life

dialog: [hushed] [groans] Well, this is just wonderful!
title: Slice of Life

dialog: Hello, Twilight Sparkle, and hello to your friends too.
title: Sonic Rainboom

dialog: Excellent. Well done, Rarity.
title: Sonic Rainboom

dialog: So Twilight Sparkle, did you learn anything about friendship from this experience?
title: Sonic Rainboom

dialog: I'm terribly honored that you and the good citizens of Ponyville have organized a parade in honor of my visit.
title: Swarm of the Century

dialog: Before I have to go, would you care to give me your latest report on the magic of friendship in person?
title: Swarm of the Century

dialog: Haven't you learned anything about friendship?
title: Swarm of the Century

dialog: So lovely to see you again, as well as your friends.
title: Swarm of the Century

dialog: I'm so proud of you, Twilight Sparkle, and I'm very impressed with your friends as well. It sounds like you're all learning so much from each other.
title: Swarm of the Century

dialog: Twilight Sparkle, my prized pupil.
title: Swarm of the Century

dialog: Now that I would like to hear.
title: Sweet and Elite

dialog: Twilight Sparkle said you were coming to Canterlot for a visit, and asked if I might accommodate you.
title: Sweet and Elite

dialog: Hm, a very valuable lesson to have learned.
title: Sweet and Elite

dialog: I'll leave you to get settled.
title: Sweet and Elite

dialog: [in background] Good evening! So nice to see you. Welcome!
title: The Best Night Ever

dialog: Welcome to the Grand Galloping Gala.
title: The Best Night Ever

dialog: That is why I was thrilled you were all attending. I was hoping you could liven things up a bit. And while the evening may not have gone as you planned, I'm sure you'll agree that in the end it didn't turn out so bad for this group of friends.
title: The Best Night Ever

dialog: Twilight! It is so lovely to see my star student.
title: The Best Night Ever

dialog: Well, I want you right by my side the entire evening, so we'll have plenty of time together.
title: The Best Night Ever

dialog: Yes. Me too, Twi... Oh, good evening! Welcome to the Gala. Which is why I... Ladies! Lovely to see you again.
title: The Best Night Ever

dialog: He is. And your Ponyville friends will join you there as well. I have every confidence you will succeed. And when you do, I'll know you are ready to move on to the next level of your studies.
title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1

dialog: An old student of mine believes he does.
title: The Crystalling - Part 2

dialog: Twilight Sparkle, I'd like to make you my own personal prot<e9>g<e9> here at the school.
title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

dialog: You six showed the full potential of the Elements by harnessing the magic of your friendship to beat a mighty foe. Although Luna and I once wielded the Elements, it is you who now control their power, and it is you who must defeat Discord!
title: The Return of Harmony Part 1

dialog: I've called you here for a matter of great importance. It seems an old foe of mine, someone I thought I had defeated long ago, has returned. His name... is Discord.
title: The Return of Harmony Part 1

dialog: We are gathered here today to once again honor the heroism of these six friends who stood up to the villain Discord and saved Equestria from eternal chaos.
title: The Return of Harmony Part 2

dialog: Thorax, as the new leader of the changelings, I look forward to discussing how we can improve our relationship in the future. However, for the moment, perhaps it is best that we leave the Changeling Kingdom to the changelings.
title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

dialog: I'm afraid I put too much trust in Discord and the effect that friendship would have upon him.
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

dialog: Having all four of us in the Empire to greet them lets the dignitaries know that their visit is considered an important one.
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

dialog: [narrating] Tirek and his brother Scorpan came here from a distant land, intent on stealing Equestrian magic. But Scorpan soon came to appreciate the ways of Equestria, even befriending a young unicorn wizard.
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

dialog: Then it is unlikely you are meant to take on this task alone.
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

dialog: You are now Twilight Sparkle, the princess of friendship. But what is the princess of friendship without her friends?
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

dialog: I'm sorry, Princess Twilight, but you must keep your new abilities a secret. I fear that your friends being aware of your new power could put them at great risk. Do you still think you can take on this responsibility?
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

dialog: We wanna hit every house in Ponyville!
title: 28 Pranks Later

dialog: What happened to all of our friends?
title: 28 Pranks Later

dialog: I thought we weren't going to wander off again.
title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

dialog: It's actually kind of sweet of him to help us out like this.
title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

dialog: Come on, we've gone far enough! It's time to go back!
title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

dialog: Poor Trouble Shoes. I can't believe those mean judges would laugh at him like that.
title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

dialog: I don't know... All these events look a little, well, dangerous.
title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

dialog: But he never wanted to ruin any rodeos! Those were just bad accidents!
title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

dialog: But maybe we'll see you later.
title: Bloom & Gloom

dialog: Um, yeah... the thing is...
title: Bloom & Gloom

dialog: Yeah. Apple Bloom, what's this all about?

dialog: Pretty great they're letting you participate even though you're not technically sisters.

dialog: It's sweet he wants to help you out like this. Weird, but sweet.
title: Brotherhooves Social

dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom, the Social's gonna start in a few hours. Thought you might want to go with us.
title: Brotherhooves Social

dialog: Yup. This time, you only packed three suitcases.
title: Campfire Tales

dialog: Not really, since we kind of overheard you yesterday.
title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark

dialog: Especially where our playground equipment should be?
title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark

dialog: Well, if that's how you treat your best friend, then I choose Pipsqueak!
title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark

dialog: We tried to talk him into it...
title: Equestria Games

dialog: And that gives me an idea!
title: Family Appreciation Day

dialog: Well, you can't run off... but maybe somepony else can!
title: Family Appreciation Day

dialog: Apple Bloom's sick! Looks like she might have to stay home all week!
title: Family Appreciation Day

dialog: Snap out of it. We're here to help you!
title: Family Appreciation Day

dialog: But that's not true, Scootaloo!
title: Flight to the Finish

dialog: Ms. Harshwhinny never said anything about that!
title: Flight to the Finish

dialog: I can't believe you're quitting on us!

dialog: But there's one problem! I bet everypony in class is planning to compete!
title: Flight to the Finish

dialog: Not without you, Scootaloo.
title: Flight to the Finish

dialog: I do not like them one bit.
title: Flight to the Finish

dialog: [muffled] At least Sapphire Shores won't be all like "Ooh, who fetched you that red ribbon? Because I don't care about anything else you made. All I care about is that amazing red ribbon!"
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: But you have to let us in! I'm Sapphire Shores' designer's sister! You have to believe us!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: You gotta see this with the cinnamon ribbon! You'll love it!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: Admit you made those dresses too good on purpose!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: How could you?! "Oh, what amazing dresses! Oh, how I love the dresses! Ooh, dresses, dresses, dresses, dresses!"
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: She's been very busy lately!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: Rarity? [gasps] Oh no! The box is... gone? I'm too late! She left for Canterlot!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: Wait, come back! Luna? Can you hear me? Thank you for what you did! Help, Luna! Luuuna!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: [sighs] I hope everything goes alright for her tomorrow.
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: Yes, good. Not jaw-dropping amazing!
title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

dialog: Rarity, this is hard for me to say, but... um...
title: Forever Filly

dialog: [sighs] I dunno. It's no big deal. This is great.
title: Forever Filly

dialog: You sure you two can handle our client here?
title: Forever Filly

dialog: You have the CMC guarantee! No matter what it takes, we promise you'll have our full attention.
title: Forever Filly

dialog: Okay, Zipporwhill. What do you see?
title: Forever Filly

dialog: Hey, Zipporwhill. What are you doing here? Where are Apple Bloom and Scootaloo?
title: Forever Filly

dialog: Well, I do have one idea...
title: Forever Filly

dialog: Aww, Rarity! I love being with you too! That will never change! But... maybe we could just try to do different things together?
title: Forever Filly

dialog: We're just gonna have to keep trying! Big Mac, are you ready to take it up a notch?
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: We're pretty sure she likes you! I mean, she keeps ordering apples just so she can see you again.
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom! Rarity's reorganizing her shop, and look what she found! Old costumes from the talent show!
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: Hey! That's our metaphorical sunset they're riding off into!
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: That's an awful long way for a pony to go, isn't it?
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: So nothing fishy's going on.
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: Yeah. He totally blushed when you brought up how often he's been going to Starlight's old village.
title: Hard to Say Anything

dialog: Miss Cheerilee, are you alright?

dialog: If we can get Big Mac and Miss Cheerilee in a really romantic setting, I bet she'll ask him.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: This one looks nice. Better try it on though.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: They aren't really gonna get married. They're just gonna get ready to get married.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: Well nothing's wrong with this one, He seems alright...
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: How could somepony as amazing as you not have a very special somepony on Hearts and Hooves Day?
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: Now it can't be just anypony. Miss Cheerilee is one of the best mares in Ponyville. She deserves to have one of the best stallions as her very special somepony.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: I'm more than all right. I've just come up with the best idea ever. We're gonna find Miss Cheerilee a very special somepony.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: Gosh, you two are so in love, the next thing you know, you'll be getting married.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: Of course it will work. They're perfect for each other.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: What's wrong? Where's Apple Bloom? Where's Big Mac?
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: With her new very special somepony.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: We did it girls, We've found the one, Who will send our teacher's heart aflutter!
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: There has to be a better solution!

dialog: Without seeing the palace!
title: Just for Sidekicks

dialog: I really like her... mane?
title: Lesson Zero

dialog: I really... like her... mane.
title: Lesson Zero

dialog: Rumble, stop! That's just not true!

dialog: Well, that certainly is... round.

dialog: That would be perfect! We'd save time and they could help each other!

dialog: We wanna learn friendship!
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: Aww. She looks so sad. We better go see what's wrong.

dialog: Or how Twilight could blame us for it!
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: Green, purple, yellow. And one more purple. Whew. Sorting all those took longer than I thought.
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: At least she likes her present?
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: That sounds like a closet.
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: [stiltedly] You are so careless! [quietly] Good plan, Apple Bloom!

dialog: [whispering] Rarity says there's never been a school like it!
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: Please can I go to Twilight's school?!
title: Marks for Effort

dialog: Don't worry, you'll be just fine!
title: On Your Marks

dialog: Like when there's something one of us wants to do that the others don't.
title: On Your Marks

dialog: I don't think Rarity would let me travel to the far reaches of Equestria looking for cutie mark problems.
title: On Your Marks

dialog: We need to talk to Applejack.
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: I'm just so excited I could burst!
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: We could always tell Applejack.
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: Isn't it smashing? No! I-I didn't mean smashing! I mean... Isn't it a hit? No! No, I- No! No hitting! I meant-
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: This is gonna be the best week of your life!
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: Teach her to fool with the Cutie Mark Crusaders!
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: We have to tell Applejack!
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: The Summer Harvest Parade's going on while you're here! You'll get to ride in a float!
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: But it's booby tra-
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: [tired] Good, 'cause we'd better get out of here before Babs finds us.
title: One Bad Apple

dialog: Hey, everypony! The show is starting!

dialog: Your friends would wanna read the Foal Free Press?
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: Scootaloo? Do you have anything?
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: Are you snooping through my saddlebag?
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: Can you please keep it down with all the laughter? I'm trying to- hey!
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: To the citizens of Ponyville,
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: We couldn't fit all of our names, so we decided to create one for all three of us.
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: [giggles] Hey, Featherweight, c'mere! [giggles] Take a few pictures of this, then meet me during lunch. Girls, I have our story.
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: We'll need to tell Featherweight to start working overtime.
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: But the gossip we've been printing is hurting everypony's feelings!
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: We've ruined all of our friendships and we still don't have our cutie marks!
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: What's an editor-in-chief?
title: Ponyville Confidential

dialog: What happened?! Is everything all right?! Where's Cozy Glow?!
title: School Raze - Part 2

dialog: [mimicking Rarity] Why, it's smashing!
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: That sounds like the perfect way for us to hang out! Rarity will think it's an excellent idea.
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: Oh hello, un-sister. What are you doing here? Better be careful, you might get some dust on you.
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: I just wanted to do something nice for my sister.
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: So, we did the whole competition... together?
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: Rarity! I thought you said I was gonna help!
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: I'll go with you and help!
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: Thank you, Applejack! You were amazing! I don't even care that we didn't win. This was so much fun! Huh? Rarity?! Wait, where's Applejack?
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: A sister is someone who loves and takes care of another sister. Applejack's a real sister.
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: You mean... you were all in on it?
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: Um, okay. Ow! You're right, it is hard work.
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: But every time I make a mess, you get upset!
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: But, I thought it would make you happy!
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: Hi, Rarity! I made a special drawing for y-
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: That's the last word Rarity would use. [mimicking Rarity] Oh my, what a repulsive monstrosity! This thing needs a head to toe makeover!
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: Hm! You want me to go home with you, so we can do what you wanna do?
title: Sisterhooves Social

dialog: See? Told you she'd wanna go.
title: Sleepless in Ponyville

dialog: I call sister teams! Last herd to make it to the falls is a moldy carrot!
title: Sleepless in Ponyville

dialog: And I'll get Rarity to come too! Rarity loves camping!
title: Sleepless in Ponyville

dialog: Maybe it's just a friendship problem, and it'll all be cleared up in half an hour or so.

dialog: Why, that sounds delightful!
title: Somepony to Watch Over Me

dialog: It must've been hours ago.
title: Somepony to Watch Over Me

dialog: And... look what I made us!
title: Stare Master

dialog: We're sorry we snuck out of the house and into the forest.
title: Stare Master

dialog: Hush now! Quiet now! It's time to lay your sleepy head! Said hush now! Quiet now! It's time to go to bed!
title: Stare Master

dialog: And, and, and, we, um- yeah! What they said!
title: Stare Master

dialog: Um ... that doesn't look like a table.
title: Stare Master

dialog: Thanks to that stare of yours.
title: Stare Master

dialog: Are you sure I can't help? I could-
title: Stare Master

dialog: Thank goodness that the Cutie Mark Crusaders have begun To give you hope and help you to decide
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: Woo-hoo! Yeah! Awesome! I love this!
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: Shhh! It's rude to ask a question like that!
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: ...we just ended up confusing you more. It's all our fault.
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: Ohhhh. I-I didn't know that.
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: Wow! That's almost... off the table!
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: It seems like everypony's got somepony special but us.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: [chomp] [reading] "Happy Hearts and Hooves Day, Sugar Belle. Meet me-"
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: Oh, it's funny. I've been sitting here feeling sorry for myself for not having a special pony on Hearts and Hooves Day. But remembering all the fun we had, I think I have two special ponies - my two best friends.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: [to Snips and Snails] Happy Hearts and Hooves Day! Did you boys happen to send any packages to me recently? It's okay to say no! I won't be offended! [whispering] Please say no, please say no, please say no.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: But we worked so hard on this chart. I think we've almost cracked it. If you could just-
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: Doesn't look like any of us ended up with what we wanted.
title: The Cart Before the Ponies

dialog: First they built the carts, now they're gonna drive them?!
title: The Cart Before the Ponies

dialog: I'm sure they meant "our" carts. Like, the team cart, right?
title: The Cart Before the Ponies

dialog: Sure! The race is the best part!
title: The Cart Before the Ponies

dialog: The Derby was supposed to be for us, not the three of you! Now you've ruined it for everypony!
title: The Cart Before the Ponies

dialog: You? Second in most creative? To whom?!
title: The Cart Before the Ponies

dialog: Maybe we should do something less dangerous, like pillow testing or flower sniffing.
title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

dialog: Oh, come on. She's just being Pinkie Pie.
title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

dialog: [gulp] Are you sure about this, Scootaloo? I've never even heard of a pony zip lining before.
title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

dialog: We're happy for you, Twilight.
title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

dialog: The Bowling Dolls! That's it!
title: The Cutie Pox

dialog: You're too kind, Apple Bloom.
title: The Cutie Pox

dialog: [muffled] Whooo! [spits out bag] I mean, yaay!
title: The Cutie Pox

dialog: Guess we'll never know for sure unless we give it a try.
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Aaaaand... she's off again.
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: But since we are the Cutie Mark Crusaders, we made you one anyway. Behold!
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Um, I think maybe that could've been clearer.
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Excited? But whatever for?
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Gabby, we're your friends. Why in Equestria are you running away from us?
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Crusaders, this is terrible! Gabby really believed in us. And now, we're gonna let her down.
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Now, Scootaloo, you do know there will always be challenges? Someday, somepony might even come to us with a problem that even we can't handle. Like, say...
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: So Scootaloo's keeping Petunia busy like you asked. What did you two want to talk about?
title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: Heard any good gossip today?
title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows

dialog: Then it's settled! Let's get started.
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: There? Where? What? I don't even know what we're doing.
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: Come back! Come back! Uh. Dumb fabric. Hey, Scoot! How's the song going?
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: I've never been here before.
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: Me too. You think we're ready?
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: Yeah. Instructions on how to use six wooden planks, four-by-eight plywood, a box of nails, four cans of paint, and four brushes.
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: Me too. Um... so what are we doing again?
title: The Show Stoppers

dialog: Oh, we're gonna look sad all right...
title: Twilight Time

dialog: This way! I know a shortcut!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: Oh, yeah?! Well, I don't have to go all the way to Manehattan to hang out with the famous and super-cool ponies! Me and my friends hang out with Princess Twilight all the time!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: [gasps] [out of breath] We... made... it... Quick! Knock on-
title: Twilight Time

dialog: Um... a-actually, no. We didn't have a chance to ask Twilight, so-
title: Twilight Time

dialog: What's tricky about inviting Twilight out for a meal thanking her for all the nice things she's done for us? Seems like the least we can do for the princess!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: Okay! But stay out of sight!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: But don't you get it? They'll have to learn something too!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: When I told you when you could come eyeball the princess at one of her favorite hangouts, I said only two or three of you, tops!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: I guess Twilight must not be so super-upset anymore, 'cause she's letting us do a diary entry like our sisters do. Boy, did we get our priorities messed up. We started acting special because we were friends with someone special. We almost forgot the real reason she's special - because she's our friend. But she forgave us, and, like magic, things are good as new! That's the kind of magic I really want to get good at, now that I'm getting so good at the other kind.
title: Twilight Time

dialog: Unfortunately, since we don't have Scootaloo's unicycle parts, she'll take apart and put back together one of the scooters from outside.
title: Twilight Time

dialog: We wanted our time together just as a way to be with you and learn new things. Really and truly!
title: Twilight Time

dialog: Now remember, Twilight takes this time out with us so we can learn stuff.
title: Twilight Time
